recipeDescriptionLines.recipeDescriptionLine: Palak Fry is a quick and simple stir fried recipe made with nutritional spinach. This dish is best enjoyed with rotis and chapathis.
Spinach is rich vitamin A, B2, B6, C, E, K, Iron, calcium, dietary fiber. It is low in fat and cholesterol.
This green leafy vegetable is available throughout the year and is affordable as well. So, make sure to buy some next time you are out to buy groceries.

procedureSteps.stepDescription: Wash spinach well under cold water.Then soak it in water along with 1/2 tbsp of salt for 15 mins. Discard spoiled leaves and finely chop the rest of the leaves and keep it aside.
In a kadai / wok, heat oil. Add onions and chillies and fry till onions turns brown. Add garlic, fry for a minute.

Add finely chopped tomato and fry till it starts leaving oil. Add cut spinach. Cover and cook for 5-7 mins. Spinach will start leaving water. Remove the lid and fry till water is evaporated completely. Add salt as per taste. Enjoy with hot rotis / chapathis.

tips.tipDesc: You can also add cumin seeds (jeera) before adding onions.
